item.description: The base class for the grounds, ceiling and walls.

field.name: base_ground.top_left_contact_mode
field.description: Tells how the contact is set on the collisions on the top left corner.

field.name: base_ground.top_right_contact_mode
field.description: Tells how the contact is set on the collisions on the top right corner.

field.name: base_ground.bottom_left_contact_mode
field.description: Tells how the contact is set on the collisions on the bottom left corner.

field.name: base_ground.bottom_right_contact_mode
field.description: Tells how the contact is set on the collisions on the bottom right corner.

field.name: base_ground.top_sets_contact
field.description: Tell if a collision on the top side sets the contact flag of the colliding item.

field.name: base_ground.bottom_sets_contact
field.description: Tell if a collision on the bottom side sets the contact flag of the colliding item.

field.name: base_ground.left_sets_contact
field.description: Tell if a collision on the left side sets the contact flag of the colliding item.

field.name: base_ground.right_sets_contact
field.description: Tell if a collision on the right side sets the contact flag of the colliding item.

field.name: base_ground.middle_sets_contact
field.description: Tell if a collision on the middle side sets the contact flag of the colliding item.
